Tribute Page: IZ*ONE

아이즈원

BTS of Panorama M/V
  • A 12-member girl group from Korea.
  • They were formed from the survival show Produce 48, which ended on August 31, 2018
  • Debuted on October 29, 2018 with their first mini-album COLOR*IZ and title song La Vie En Rose.
  • Their 2nd mini-album, HEART*IZ, with the title track Violeta, was released on April 1, 2019
  • Their first full album, BLOOM*IZ, with the title track FIESTA was released on February 17, 2020
  • Their 3rd mini-album, Oneiric Diary, with the title track Secret Story of the Swan, was released on June 15, 2020
  • Their latest mini-album, One-reeler, with the title track Panorama was released on 7 Dec, 2020
